Title: 39033 - # Tips for a Healthy Pregnancy
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for a healthy pregnancy. Talk about having a healthy diet, getting enough rest, taking prenatal vitamins, limiting caffeine, etc. You can include the client link by discussing that if you have any concerns during your pregnancy during hours that your doctor is not available, you can use Curely to ask questions. Your audience consists of women who are pregnant or trying to get pregnant.

Title: 39034 - # Health Benefits of Having a Positive Mind Set
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 health benefits of having a positive attitude. These can include increased life span, lower rates of depression, reduced risk of cardiovascular disease, etc. You can include the client link by explaining that if you have any concerns about your health you can ask one of the professionals on Curely. Your audience consists of people interested in maintaining a positive lifestyle.

Title: 39035 - # Tips for Bringing Your Newborn Baby Home
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for parents for when they bring their newborn baby home from the hospital. These can include making sure your home is clean, making sure their room and clothes are ready, making sure you have a pediatrician picked out, having a list of emergency contact numbers etc. You can include the client link when explaining that if you have any concerns or questions you can contact the professionals at Curely. Your audience consists of parents and soon to be parents.
